thread.section_title: Citadines Trafalgar Square London - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good Value and Handy
thread.title_full: Good Value and Handy - Review of Citadines Trafalgar Square London, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Peter G
title: Good Value and Handy
text:
We stayed here for three nights in March on a business trip. The hotel is very conveniently located - close to Trafalgar Square, Jubilee Bridge and two tube stations. The room was fine and had a good kitchenette. No daily housekeeping but that was no problem for us. Breakfast was 12GBP but we bought cereal from a nearby store.They have a cell phone with free local minutes and data that you can use during your stay and which is handy to have on hand as you go about the city.
Overall I recommend this hotel as good value for money.
